How does that work for ValueSets that are too big to stuff into a Questionnaire, e.g. if you had a lookup for ICD-10 or a drug name field?

We limited our scope to simple forms. You are free raise a git issue. I have not heard a groundswell from the Argonaut community to revisit the IG., but if they decide to, we'll address it.
